article.title: Austin U.S. Export Assistance Center Contact Information
article.summary: Contact the Austin U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​

The Austin USEAC covers the following counties in Central Texas:

Bastrop, Bell, Blanco, Bosque, Brown, Burleson, Burnet, Caldwell, Coleman, Comanche, Coryell, Falls, Fayette, Gillespie, Hamilton, Hays, Hill, Kimble, Lampasas, Lee, Limestone, Llano, Mason, McCulloch, McLennan, Menard, Milam, Mills, Robertson, San Saba, Schleicher, Sutton, Travis, and Williamson.

Please be sure to CALL FIRST for an appointment, we may be out of the office visiting companies or hosting an event.

Austin Office Contact Information

Austin U.S. Export Assistance Center
P.O. Box 12428 - 78711
221 E. 11th St. - 4th Floor
Austin, TX. 78701
Fax: 512-916-5940
office.austin@trade.gov
Website:http://www.export.gov/texas/austin

Austin Staff

Karen Parker
Director, International Trade Specialist
Phone: 512-916-5939
Email:Karen.Parker@trade.gov

Larry Tabash
International Trade Specialist
Phone: 512-936-0039
Email:Larry.Tabash@trade.gov

Trade Information Center

1-800-USA-TRADE (1-800-872-8723). The Trade Information Center works in conjunction with your local office. For immediate export assistance or for answers to your technical questions on exporting, call M-F 8:30am - 6:00 pm Eastern time.​
